DOC.brief_summary: This multicentric phase III study design assess efficacy safety recombinant asparaginase ( rASNase ) comparison Asparaginase medac™ treatment child de novo ALL
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Efficacy Safety Two Asparaginase Preparations Children With Previously Untreated Acute Lymphoblastic Leukaemia
DOC.criteria: Previously untreated Tlineage precursor Blineage ALL Patients must morphological proof ALL diagnosis must make bone marrow morphology 25 % blast Written inform consent Treatment accord DCOG ALL 10 protocol Mature Blineage ALL Patients secondary ALL Known allergy ASNase preparation General health status accord Karnofsky / Lansky score < 40 % Preexisting know coagulopathy ( e.g . haemophilia ) Preexisting pancreatitis Liver insufficiency ( Bilirubin > 50 µmol/L ; SGOT/SGPT > 10 x ULN ) Other current malignancy Pregnancy ( plan existent ) , breast feeding
DOC.keyword: Children previously untreated acute lymphoblastic leukemia
